titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2657) making appropriations for the Legislative Branch for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2004, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 108-191, by Mr. Linder.
Rule waives all points of order against the bill and against its consideration.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 78.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 311.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

POSTPONED PROCEEDINGS - The Chair put the question on passage of the resolution, as amended, by voice vote and announced that the yeas had prevailed. Ms. Slaughter objected to the voice vote based on the absence of a quorum. The Chair subsequently announced that further proceedings were postponed until later in the legislative day.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 411 - 13 (Roll no. 342).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 7/9/2003--Passed House without amendment. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 2657 (FY 2004 legislative branch appropriations).
